DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety 6 month two different dos vitamin D ( cholecalciferol ) men woman age 65 old . It also evaluate supplementation vitamin D improve physical performance .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Vitamin D Supplementation Older Persons
DOC.detailed_description: 120 ambulatory men woman age 65 95 enrol study . Each subject participate clinical trial 6 month . Parathyroid hormone , vitamin D , serum urinary calcium measure periodically . Physical performance test baseline throughout study .
DOC.criteria: ambulatory hypercalcemia hypercalciuria > 4 mg/kg body weight/day primary , secondary , tertiary hyperparathyroidism renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine > 2 mg/dL ) history nephrolithiasis treatment vitamin D ( ergocalciferol , cholecalciferol , calcitriol ) treatment anticonvulsant Paget 's disease severe cardiac , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , neurological disease life expectancy < 1 year participation another trial
